item.title: FL STUDIO | Transporter
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Transporter is your shortcut to automatically rearranging and recreating new and exiting mashups of any real-time audio stream. Transporter was introduced with FL Studio 24.1 and was retrospectively included with All Plugins Edition for all existing and future owners. Learn more about how it works below ... It's also the...
item.content:encoded:
Transporter is your shortcut to automatically rearranging and recreating new and exiting mashups of any real-time audio stream. Transporter was introduced with FL Studio 24.1 and was retrospectively included with All Plugins Edition for all existing and future owners. Learn more about how it works below ...   It's also the perfect time to jump in and Buy or Upgrade FL Studio with our 30% off EOY deals.  

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Learn more about Transporter in the manual

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: Your shortcut to relooping and rearranging any audio. Learn how Transporter works in our tutorial video, after the jump...

item.title: FL STUDIO 2024.2 | What’s New?
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: FL STUDIO 2024.2 | The latest update is packed with user-requested features, workflow improvements, new sounds and more. As usual, customers can take advantage of their Lifetime Free Updates to download this free update right now because we believe nobody should pay for updates! It's also the perfect time to...
item.content:encoded:
FL STUDIO 2024.2 | The latest update is packed with user-requested features, workflow improvements, new sounds and more. As usual, customers can take advantage of their Lifetime Free Updates to download this free update right now because we believe nobody should pay for updates! It's also the perfect time to jump in and Buy or Upgrade FL Studio with our 30% off EOY deals.

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO 24.2 OR BUY FL STUDIO 

(Customers please reapply your license to unlock this release)

WHAT'S NEW?

  • FL Studio
    • Improved Unlock - The unlock process is now more automated, if you have previously logged into your account. Trial users can now create an account to gain access to online features as part of the unlock process.
    • FL Studio macOS Menu - Items from the Main Menu are added to the macOS Application Menu.
    • Tap Tempo - Deselect the 'Apply tempo' option so tapping doesn't change the Project's Tempo. Useful for investigating the tempo of audio you're listening to.
    • Tempo detection - When Tempos are detected there is an option to ignore decimals.
    • Metronome - New 'Pulse' sound, suited to audio recording.
    • Time Panel - Added SMPTE options, (Right-Click) to set.
    • Hint bar - Shows the Project file name instead of the Authors Name in the Hint Bar if no Title is set for increased privacy.
    • Icons - Clap, Snap, Zero icons were added to locations where Icons can be selected as part of Rename dialogs.
  • FL Cloud
    • Sounds - Added support for Hot-swapping 'Placeholder' samples by selecting 'Hot Swap' mode and clicking samples in the list. This will send them to the selected Sampler Channel or Audio Clip. There's also support for Drag-and-drop workflow with DirectWave, Edison, FPC, Granulizer, NewTime, Sampler Channels, Scratcher, Slicer, Wave Traveller, Convolver, Slicer, Slicex & Wave Traveller.
  • Playlist & Piano roll:
    • Ghost Notes - The Piano roll can now show Ghost Notes from other Patterns, if the Pattern clips overlap in the Playlist. Supporting is a Ghost Note 'Channels' selector on the upper-right side of the Piano roll window to decide what Channels show. Additionally, use the Playlist Track headers (Right-Click) > 'Show patterns as PR ghosts' decide which Playlist Tracks will display. NOTE: Out-of-Pattern Ghost Notes are outlined notes, in-Pattern are solid notes.
    • Snap MIDI to Scale - (Right-Click) option on the Piano roll > Snap to key menu to snap incoming MIDI to the same settings as the Piano roll.
    • Find stacked Clips & Notes - Option to 'Select stacked clips' (in the Playlist) and 'Select stacked notes' (in the Piano roll). Stacked means 100% overlap, and is in addition to 'Overlapping' Notes and Clips.
    • Picker Panel Pattern colors - The (Right-Click) Pattern option > 'Color' selected Patterns changes colors without the name-change dialog pop-up. It will also open the full color selection window when using 'Change color' for a selection of Audio or Automation clips.
    • Automated Track Names - FL Studio will use the Playlist Track's name for an Audio Track if the destination Mixer Track doesn't have a name.
    • Extract stems - Sets the Name and Icon of created Playlist Stem Tracks to match the stem type. Additionally, the 'Safe mode' option for some CPUs can avoid crashes and erroneous audio on systems experiencing issues.
    • Chord progression tool - Changing the inversion number ignores the Root in all cases.
  • Mixer:
    • Monitoring - Added a low latency track mode (for live playing or recording) 'Delay audio output'. Use to disable PDC when monitoring live inputs but is still corrects latency when rendering and recording audio.
    • Routing - New (Right-Click) option > Select > 'Channels and playlist tracks routed to this track' to help with Instrument and Audio Track workflow.
  • Channel Rack
    • Browse channel states - Channel menu option to open the Channel Presets menu item in the Browser.
  • Browser
    • Sounds Tab - Pre-load the Sounds Tab's when FL Studio starts for quicker access.
    • Project samples - Samples used in the project show in the Current Project section of the Browser.
    • Channel Presets - Folder for Sampler Channel envelopes.
    • Plugin Database - Reorganized the Plugin Database with more intuitive categories (Use 'Clear settings' in the installer to use it for an existing over-installation).
  • Plugins
    • Transporter (All Plugins Edition) - New realtime & relooping FX plugin.
    • Vectorial interfaces - DrumPad, Effector, PoiZone and Sawer now have vectorial user interfaces.
    • Plugin scaling - Use the Plugin Window Menu > 'Scaling' to resize the following plugins: Balance, BeepMap, Big clock, Center, Convolver, dB meter, Delay, DX10, Edison, Envelope controller, EQUO, Fast LP, FLEX, Formula Controller, FPC, Frequency Splitter, Fruit Kick, Fruity Dance, Gross Beat, Harmor, Keyboard Controller, Limiter, Love Philter, Low Lifter, Maximus, MIDI Out, Multiband Delay, Mute 2, Newtime, Newtone, Notebook, Notebook 2, Parametric EQ 2, Phase Inverter, Reeverb, WaveShaper, ReWired, Slicer, Slicex, Spectroman, Spreader, Sytrus, Tuner, Vocodex, Wave Traveller, X-Y-Z Controller, X-Y Controller. Particularly useful when working on multiple monitors at different resolutions and because BIGGER is better!
    • LuxeVerb - Added a Limiter (L) switch to disable the Limiter / Saturation on the Wet Output. Selected is on.
    • Voltage Controller - Added independent control for each Output using Note Colors.
    • Parametric EQ 2 - Added subscript indicators on the HQ button for +, Legacy (L) and Enhanced (E) modes to better indicate which mode is active.
    • Edison Scripting - Audio preview is now possible while Scripting.
    • Scratcher - Now includes DVS support.
    • Plugin Window - Menu item 'Browse channel states' opens the Browser > Channel presets folder allows quick-save location access.
    • Plugin Presets - Default to 'Tree view'.
    • DirectWave presets & Soundfonts - Can be sent to the Playlist as Instrument Tracks.
    • Control Surface - While in Edit mode, (Right-Click) controls and open Properties > 'Hint' to type a hint when the control is moused over.
    • ZGE Visualizer - Supports 'Spout' video feeds.
    • Video Player - Includes expanded SMPTE options, matching the Time Panel.
    • FLEX - Supports packs included in an FL Cloud Pro subscription. Note: All packs remain available for perpetual purchase.

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: FL Studio 2024.2 out now. It's full of user-requested features, workflow improvements, new sounds and more. We love Lifetime Free Updates!

item.title: FL STUDIO | Low Lifter Bass
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Low Lifter uses harmonics to create the perception of stronger and lower bass, even on devices incapable of reproducing low bass frequencies. Learn more about Low Lifter and the psychoacoustic principles it uses to trick your brain in the video below ... DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO Learn...
item.content:encoded:
Low Lifter uses harmonics to create the perception of stronger and lower bass, even on devices incapable of reproducing low bass frequencies. Learn more about Low Lifter and the psychoacoustic principles it uses to trick your brain in the video below ...    

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Learn more about Low Lifter in the manual

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: Low Lifter relies on powerful psychoacoustic laws to enhance and even create phantom bass frequencies. Discover how Low Lifter tricks you ...

item.title: FL STUDIO | Chord Progression Tool
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Chord Progressions are the harmonic foundation for the emotions evoked by your music. Some Progressions feel bright and joyful while others evoke feelings of darkness and mystery. Chord Progressions can be memorable, can signify a genre and most important for you as a producer, a great chord progression sets you up for success by...
item.content:encoded:
Chord Progressions are the harmonic foundation for the emotions evoked by your music. Some Progressions feel bright and joyful while others evoke feelings of darkness and mystery. Chord Progressions can be memorable, can signify a genre and most important for you as a producer, a great chord progression sets you up for success by establishing the key and note structure for the melody and bass to follow. Starting with a solid progression makes writing the rest of your just that much easier. Learn more about the Chord Progression Tool in the video below ...    

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Learn more about the CPT in the manual

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: The Chord Progression Tool is your emotion generator built right into the Piano roll. Included with all editions of FL Studio 24.1 onward. Enjoy ...

item.title: FL STUDIO | Kepler Exo
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: What would the JUNO-6™ and Jupiter-8™ Synthesizers be if they were conceived in the age of the plugin instrument? We think Kepler Exo answers that question. Extreme attention was paid to analyzing the oscillators, filters and interaction of the controls to produce a sound that does justice to the original...
item.content:encoded:
What would the JUNO-6™ and Jupiter-8™ Synthesizers be if they were conceived in the age of the plugin instrument? We think Kepler Exo answers that question. Extreme attention was paid to analyzing the oscillators, filters and interaction of the controls to produce a sound that does justice to the original classics.  Kepler Exo is included with FL Studio All Plugins Edition.  Learn more about Kepler Exo in the video below ...    

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Learn more about Kepler Exo in the manual

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: What if the JUNO-6™ & Jupiter-8™ synths were plugins? Kepler Exo answers the question. Meticulous oscillator & filter design to honor the originals.

item.title: FL STUDIO | Spreader Stereo Enhancer
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Spreader is included with FL Studio Producer Edition and up. Spreader widens the stereo image of your audio without affecting its compatibility with mono systems. This means that even if you listen to the audio on a mono speaker or a system that combines stereo channels into mono, it will...
item.content:encoded:
Spreader is included with FL Studio Producer Edition and up. Spreader widens the stereo image of your audio without affecting its compatibility with mono systems. This means that even if you listen to the audio on a mono speaker or a system that combines stereo channels into mono, it will still sound good.  Learn more in the video below ...    

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Lean more in the manual here

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: Expand Your Stereo, preserve your mono! Learn more about Spreader introduced with FL Studio 24.1

item.title: FLEX | Retrowave Featured Artists
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: FLEX Retrowave Featured Artists by Saif Sameer - A vast collection of sounds based on the style & influence of a selection of 10 featured artists from the FL Studio community. Bringing together the brightest minds in the scene, Retrowave Featured Artists combines the talents of 7 producers in a...
item.content:encoded:
FLEX Retrowave Featured Artists by Saif Sameer - A vast collection of sounds based on the style & influence of a selection of 10 featured artists from the FL Studio community. Bringing together the brightest minds in the scene, Retrowave Featured Artists combines the talents of 7 producers in a hive mind of over 700 presets.

Open FLEX and check the STORE tab to purchase, just $19.95 (USD)

More than 700 presets for instant Retro sound:

  • 161 Basses
  • 241 Lead Sounds
  • 147 Synth Keys
  • 51 Bells
  • 53 Synth Brass Sounds
  • 42 Drones
  • 15 Drum Patches

FLEX is a preset-based synthesizer included free with FL Studio and driven by an advanced synthesis engine capable of Subtractive, Wavetable, Multisample, FM & AM based synthesis. The 8 Macros control custom synthesis targets, for each patch, and allow you to focus on what's most important: making music.

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: FLEX Library | Based on the style & influence of a selection of 10 featured artists from the FL Studio community. More than 700 retro presets!

item.title: FLEX | The Goodie Bag Hip Hop by MSXII
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Introducing FLEX The Goodie Bag Hip Hop Library. Capture the art of hip-hop sampling with an eclectic collection of 115 inspiring sounds and audio treats designed to ignite your creativity. The Goodie Bag Hip Hop by MSXII is inspired by everything from classic gritty textures, drifty pianos, and smooth EPs,...
item.content:encoded:
Introducing FLEX The Goodie Bag Hip Hop Library. Capture the art of hip-hop sampling with an eclectic collection of 115 inspiring sounds and audio treats designed to ignite your creativity. The Goodie Bag Hip Hop by MSXII is inspired by everything from classic gritty textures, drifty pianos, and smooth EPs, to warm analog synth tones and futuristic granular FX.

Open FLEX and check the STORE tab to purchase, just $14.95 (USD)

Designed as a go-to production tool kit for producers of Hip Hop, Trap, Chill, Lo-Fi, R&B, Soul, Pop, House, or anyone looking to add a bit of character, texture, and vibe to their tracks. This is where sounds of the future merge with the soundtrack of the past.

FLEX is a preset-based synthesizer included free with FL Studio and driven by an advanced synthesis engine capable of Subtractive, Wavetable, Multisample, FM & AM based synthesis. The 8 Macros control custom synthesis targets, for each patch, and allow you to focus on what's most important: making music.

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: FLEX Library | Capture the art of hip-hop sampling with an eclectic collection of 115 inspiring sounds and audio treats to ignite your creativity.

item.title: FL STUDIO 2024 | What’s New?
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: FL STUDIO 2024 | Introducing a monster vintage synthesizer, Kepler Exo, two new effects, free plugins for all in FL Cloud plus there's a Chord Progression creator and many more workflow enhancements as requested by our customers. As ever, we’re committed to Lifetime Free Updates, so update free right now....
item.content:encoded:
FL STUDIO 2024 | Introducing a monster vintage synthesizer, Kepler Exo, two new effects, free plugins for all in FL Cloud plus there's a Chord Progression creator and many more workflow enhancements as requested by our customers. As ever, we’re committed to Lifetime Free Updates, so update free right now.

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO 2024 OR BUY FL STUDIO 

(Customers please login on the About Panel to unlock this release)

For more details see the FL Studio 2024 blog-page here

WHAT'S NEW?

  • FL Cloud
    • FL Cloud (Plugins) - FL Cloud Plugins are available free to all FL Studio customers. Subscribers get even more though an ever expanding range of 3rd party and Image-Line Group VST plugins. NOTE: FL Cloud Plugins are separate from those that come with the various FL Studio Editions and FL Studio will always be available for separate purchase with Lifetime Free Updates.
    • Mastering - Subscribers can now continue to refine the automated master with a set of manual controls.
  • FL Studio
    • FL Studio Startup - Show an optional 'Welcome window' with quick-start options such as loading projects, creating a song or recording audio into the Playlist.
    • CLAP Plugin Support - Introducing CLever Audio Plug-in (CLAP) plugin support.
    • CPU Enhancement - FL Studio now use Blend2D to for the user interface (faster graphics with lower CPU).
    • File support - AIFF import now supported.
    • Macros - ‘Switch all audio clips to’ time stretching macros.
    • Plugin Picker - Improved search shows items with any of the letters typed.
    • Plugin Wrapper - Implemented poly aftertouch for VST3 plugins.
    • User manual - Added an option to show the online Help / Manual in the Communications Panel. See General Settings to set.
    • Scripting - The Script Editor option is now on the 'External tools' panel in File settings
    • Purge FL Cloud cache - General settings option to purge the FL Cloud Sounds cache if things are not loading correctly.
    • Keyboard Shortcuts - General Settings option to 'Manage keyboard shortcuts' for selected functions inc. Browser & Pickers and MIDI import (it's a start! More in future.)
    • Trial Startup - Choose the FL Studio Edition to test in Trial Mode. Time unlimited.
    • Tool buttons - Show if they're pressed when hovered.
    • Info panel - User name replaced by a 'license plate' number for privacy when using FL Studio in public, such as online videos.
    • Menu Bar - Added options to view News, Downloads and Notifications.
    • Audio Buffer (macOS) - The default buffer on macOS (Apple Silicon) is now 128 to encourage the use of 'Performance' cores over 'Efficiency' cores.
    • Plugin Management (macOS) - Search for VST3 plugins in the user's Library folder (and not only in the system Library folder).
    • File Support - WAVPack and M4A files can now be dropped on Mixer & Playlist tracks.
  • Instruments & Effects
    • Kepler Exo (Instrument) - New vintage synth plugin that imagines the world where the JUNO-6™ and Jupiter-8™ Synthesizers would have been, if they were conceived in the age of the plugin instrument. Included with All Plugins Edition.
    • Low Lifter (Effect) - Low Lifter dynamically adds harmonics to bass frequencies, enhancing their presence and creating the perception of stronger bass, even on devices incapable of reproducing deep sub frequencies effectively. Included with Signature Bundle and higher.
    • Spreader (Effect) - Non-destructive stereo enhancer plugin (mono compatible). Included with Producer Edition and higher.
    • Edison - Improved AI Declipper. There are now models optimized for Vocals and General (music) audio and a new Vocal Denoiser Tool.
    • MIDI Out - Added "Note off" value selector for "Note" controls.
    • Sampler Channel - You can now (Right-Click) the waveform preview and select 'Locate file' to open the OS File Browser with the sample selected.
  • Piano roll
    • Chord Progression Tool - AI powered tool to boost your creative process with musical Chord Progressions. Preset and algorithmic options.
    • Piano roll - Note repeat for the Piano roll (Event Editor area) and Stepsequencer (Graph Editors).
    • Piano roll scripting - More controls and functions.
  • Playlist
    • Make Unique Clips - Hold (Shift+V+Left-Click and Drag) and release - Copies the affected Pattern Clip and Makes a unique instance or Select Clip/s and use (Ctrl+Shift+V) to makes the selected Clip/s unique.
    • Audio Clips - Place new Audio Clips in view when using 'Send to playlist as an audio clip' menu options.
    • Automation Clip Editor - Added a 'Select in playlist' button to the Automation Clip Editor to improve Clip discovery.
    • Instrument vs Audio Track - Choose action when a sample is dropped on Instrument Tracks in the Playlist.
    • Nudge Edits - 'Edit menu > Nudge clips with mouse wheel' allows you to turn the Shift+Mouse-Wheel nudge behavior on and off.
  • Browser
    • Browser - Sample preview options match FL Sounds (Tempo and Key sync) when dropped into project. Options display on the sample Preview Panel on mouse over the sample preview. The sample must have this meta-data to work with these controls.
    • Browser - Select a Browser Tab and show the options when Right-Clicked.
  • Channel Rack & Stepsequencer
    • Channel Rack - Deleting multiple Audio or Instrument Channels asks to delete associated data for every Channel.
    • Swing - Per Channel option (and macros) to truncate swing notes. (Right-Click) the Swing knob on the Miscellaneous Channel Settings.
  • MIDI scripting
    • Browser - Browser navigation functions now work with the Sounds Tab.
    • Functions - Added a parameter to setRouteTo to perform afterRoutingChanged & functions to get and set mixer send levels.
  • Mixer
    • Effects Slots - Mix level Automation Clips now show the Mixer Track name.
    • Colors - Added 'Random color' to the mixer's effect slot menu.

FL Studio Team
item.metadata:description: This is a huge! Free plugins for all in FL Cloud, new instruments and effects, a Chord Progression Tool plus more. We love Lifetime Free Updates.

item.title: FL STUDIO | How to make Psytrance
item.dc:creator: Image Line Software
item.description: Psytrance is a subgenre of Trance music that emerged in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Characterized by its high tempo, layered melodies, and driving rhythms. In this tutorial we take you from zero to hero in creating a Psytrance track ... DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO ...
item.content:encoded:
Psytrance  is a subgenre of Trance music that emerged in the late 1980s and early 1990s. Characterized by its high tempo, layered melodies, and driving rhythms. In this tutorial we take you from zero to hero in creating a Psytrance track ...     

DOWNLOAD FL STUDIO OR BUY FL STUDIO 

Login to your account and download the project made in the video above from Looptalk

Image-Line
item.metadata:description: Fan of Psytrance? In this video we show you how to make it. Click through to watch the video and download the demo track shown in the video.
